enhanced_posts.text:
Texans should remove Abbott. Stop the #gop. 

Texas Gov. Greg Abbott says he will begin trying to remove Democratic lawmakers from office Monday if they do not return after dozens of them left the state in an attempt to block the adoption of redrawn U.S. House maps sought by President #Trump.
